topics.body:
Still love Hellsing Ultimate Abridged. Possibly my favorite single line to come out of the series is this one:

"Here's what you do- you go down to the pharmacy, you pick up something called Viagra, and it'll help you _*go fuck yourself!*_"

I don't know how Team Four Star does it in general. I could never be that funny on purpose.
